documentation.text: @dev Returns the owner of the contract.
@dev Returns the pending owner of the contract.
@dev Leaves the contract without owner, and clears the pendingOwner, if any.
@dev Allows a new account to take ownership of the contract.
@dev Takes ownership of the contract.

@dev   Is emitted when a token vesting schedule is set for a receiver.
 @param receiver_ The receiver of a token vesting schedule.

@dev   Is emitted when the contract is funded for vesting.
 @param totalTokens_ The total amount of tokens to be vested.
@dev The vesting token.
@dev The total amount of tokens being vested.

@dev   Returns the vesting schedule of a receiver.
 @param receiver_      The receiver of a vesting schedule.

@dev   Fund the contact with tokens that will be vested.
 @param totalTokens_ The amount of tokens that will be supplied to this contract.

@dev   Claim the callers tokens of a vesting schedule.
 @param destination_ The destination to send the tokens.

ReceiverChanged(address,address).details: Is emitted when the receiver of a token vesting schedule is changed.

params.newReceiver: The new receiver of the token vesting schedule.
params.oldReceiver: The old receiver of the token vesting schedule.

RecoveredToken(address,uint256,address).details: Is emitted when some ERC20 token is recovered from the contract.

params.destination: The destination the token was sent to.

TokensClaimed(address,uint256,address).details: Is emitted when a receiver claims tokens from its vesting schedule.

params.destination_: The destination the claimed tokens have been sent to.
params.receiver_: The receiver of a token vesting schedule.

VestingFunded(uint256).details: Is emitted when the contract is funded for vesting.

params.totalTokens_: The total amount of tokens to be vested.

VestingKilled(address,uint256,address).details: Is emitted when the token vesting schedule for a receiver is killed.

params.destination_: The destination the token have been sent to.
params.receiver_: The receiver that had its token vesting schedule killed.

VestingScheduleSet(address).details: Is emitted when a token vesting schedule is set for a receiver.

params.receiver_: The receiver of a token vesting schedule.

changeReceiver(address,address).details: Change the receiver of an existing vesting schedule.

claimTokens(address).details: Claim the callers tokens of a vesting schedule.

params.destination_: The destination to send the tokens.

claimableTokens(address).details: Returns the amount of claimable tokens for a receiver of a vesting schedule.

fundVesting(uint256).details: Fund the contact with tokens that will be vested.

params.totalTokens_: The amount of tokens that will be supplied to this contract.

killVesting(address,address).details: Kill the vesting schedule for a receiver.

params.destination_: The destination to send the tokens.

owner().details: Returns the owner of the contract.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the pending owner of the contract.

recoverToken(address,address).details: Recover tokens owned by the contract.

params.destination_: The destination to send the ETH.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner, and clears the pendingOwner, if any.

setVestingSchedules(address[],(uint256,u.details: Set the vesting schedules for some receivers, respectively.

params.receivers_: An array of receivers of vesting schedules.

totalVestingsTokens().details: The total amount of tokens being vested.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows a new account to take ownership of the contract.

vestingScheduleOf(address).details: Returns the vesting schedule of a receiver.

params.receiver_: The receiver of a vesting schedule.
